SELECT * FROM Book b LEFT JOIN BookPage bp ON b.book_id = bp.book_id LEFT JOIN BookFurniture bf ON b.book_id = bf.book_id LEFT JOIN LLifeFurniture blf ON bf.lf_id = blf.lf_id WHERE b.book_id = #{bookId}
